channel.title: Backups on Identity Managed
channel.description: Recent content in Backups on Identity Managed

item.title: Restoring your FIM databases to the moment before oops
item.description: At the FIM Birds of a Feather (BOF) after a discussion about FIM database backups I was asked to make a blog post to more fully elucidate the benefits of using the full recovery model. Since Recovery models affect the transaction log you may find it useful to have the following background about transaction logs: â€¢The Data in tables and indexes are stored in data files not the transaction log
